mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, COL_SNO, COL_PNM, ANA_VAR_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_UODC_DASE_IMP_COL (UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, COL_SNO, COL_PNM, ANA_VAR_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM) values (#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(COL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_IMP_COL WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UDF_OTL_DTC_ID,

COL_SNO,

COL_LNM,

OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM

mapper.update:
update WAD_UODC_DASE_IMP_COL
COL_PNM = #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANA_VAR_ID = #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COL_SNO = #{colSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT A.COL_PNM, B.FILE_PATH FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_IMP_COL A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_DASE_IMP B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
